thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Kyle Grace

author: Kyle Grace
title: Kyle Grace
text:
Posted a basic gardening job in Kensington, Victoria using the airtasker website. I didn't get many people interested in doing it though. Only got two offers and both were way more than what I was looking for/ thought was worth it for the ease of the job. Airtasker support was really responsive and provided some great advice for improving the offers to do the job. So I included some more pictures and description based on that advice. Unfortunately I only got one more offer that was marginally better than the other two.
So I would have got the job done way cheaper if I'd gone through gumtree or some such, but then I suppose more risk is on me...
